titleStmt.title: The happiness of a quiet mind both in youth and old age, with the way to attain it in a discourse occasioned by the death of Mrs. Martha Hasselborn who died March 13th, 1695/6, in the 95th year of her age / By Timothy Rogers ...
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Timothy, 1658-1728.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
